"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen - This song is a masterpiece of rock music and a great representation of the journey and ups and downs of life.
"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This song's motivational lyrics and powerful instrumentals make it a great choice for any moment of determination and perseverance.
"Hallelujah" by Leonard Cohen - This song's haunting melody and introspective lyrics make it a great choice for moments of contemplation and reflection.
"Happy" by Pharrell Williams - This song's upbeat tempo and positive lyrics make it a great choice for moments of joy and celebration.
"Imagine" by John Lennon - This song's message of peace and unity make it a great choice for moments of hope and inspiration.
